quote.text: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul.
quote.author: Audrey Hepburn

scripture.text: And Christ hath said: If ye will have faith in me ye shall have power to do whatsoever thing is expedient in me.

message:
Hey Ms SunshineðŸ©·

I'm just really happy you made it home safely after work today... I know how much energy into everything you do and it makes me admire you more than words can hold.

You have to know that you have an inner purpose thatâ€™s deeper than just dreams or goals. Itâ€™s written in the way you move through Everything its intentional, kind, and powerful. you a woman of purpose... The most incredible person in the world to me.

I truly believe you going to impact millions of lives ..little girls, young women, even grown women just by being you... Just by existing with your light, your laugh and your determination. They'll feel loved because of the way you love Yourself... They'll see themselves clearer because of the way you show up for you.

And the love you'll get in return? From them, your future family, and everyone lucky enough to know your name ...it's going to be beyond anything you've imagined.

I admire you very very much, and no matter what life bringsâ€¦ I will always be in your corner. Always.
